# Packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lavaan)
library(lavaanPlot)
```

# Data
```{r}
# Load Data
whr <- read.csv("whr.csv")

# Rename variables
whr <- whr |> 
  rename(
    LL = Life.Ladder,
    GDP = Log.GDP.per.capita,
    SS = Social.support,
    LE = Healthy.life.expectancy.at.birth,
    FLC = Freedom.to.make.life.choices,
    GEN = Generosity,
    PC = Perceptions.of.corruption,
    PAF = Positive.affect,
    NAF = Negative.affect,
  )
```

# Measurement Model

```{r}
# model specification
mea_model <- "HPP =~ SS + LE + FLC + PAF + GDP + LL + GEN + PC + NAF"

#model fit
mea_model_fit <- sem(mea_model, data = whr)

#model summary
summary(mea_model_fit, standardized = TRUE, fit.measures = TRUE)
```


# SEM Model
```{r}
#model specification
whr_sem_model <- "HPP =~ SS + LE + FLC + PAF + GDP + LL
              LE ~~ GDP + FLC
              FLC ~~ PAF + GDP
              SS ~~ LL
              "
#model fit
sem_model_fit <- sem(whr_sem_model, data = whr)

#model summary
summary(sem_model_fit, standardized = TRUE, fit.measures = TRUE)

```

```{r}
library(semPlot)
semPaths(
  sem_model_fit,
  whatLabels = "std",
  what = "std",
  edge.color = "black"
)
```
